Gym Class VR: Companion App

Connect with the world's largest virtual reality sports community! The Gym Class VR: Companion App brings the excitement of the top basketball simulator game right to your mobile device. Experience high-flying dunks, engage in pickup games with friends from around the globe, and compete for stardom in the premier VR sports community, known for delivering the best-rated experiences on Quest.
